## ðŸ”‘ Core Message (All Platforms)

> "No other AI framework can do this."

**The Story:**
Healthcare handoff failures (23%) â†’ Predicts software deployment failures (87% confidence)

**The Technology:**
Level 5 cross-domain pattern transfer

**The Value:**
Learn from healthcare's decades of safety research to prevent software failures

**The Demo:**
```bash
pip install empathy-framework[full]
python examples/level_5_transformative/run_full_demo.py
```

- Free for teams â‰¤5 employees

## ðŸ’¬ Response Templates

**"How is this different from static analysis?"**
â†’ Static analysis works within a single domain. This learns patterns from healthcare and applies them to softwareâ€”cross-domain reasoning no other tool can do.

**"87% confidence seems high"**
â†’ Based on semantic similarity between domains, source research quality (healthcare handoffs are well-documented), and matching vulnerability indicators. Working demo shows methodology.

**"Why not fully open source?"**
â†’ Fair Source balances free access (students, small teams) with sustainable development. Auto-converts to Apache 2.0 in 2029.
